#id=1
#text=Last month I wanted to go visit my parents in Florida , but I hate to fly .
#id=2
#text=After thinking about it for a little while , I decided to take the train .
#id=3
#text=It 's not as fast as flying but it is a lot faster than driving .
#id=4
#text=I got on my computer and pulled up the train schedules to see if there was one that would work to get me where I was going .
#id=5
#text=After checking a few , I found one headed the way I needed to go that was also running at the right time .
#id=6
#text=I bought a round trip ticket right from the website .
#id=7
#text=Since it would only take 10 hours to get there , I did n't bother getting a spot in a sleeper car , just a regular seat .
#id=8
#text=I packed up the things I needed and headed to the train station .
#id=9
#text=Once I was there I checked in and got on the train .
#text=About 10 minutes later it was time to go and the train rumbled out of the station .
#text=I had a window seat , so I could watch the scenery go by as we sped along the tracks .
#text=After a little while I decided to go up to the food car and get some lunch .
#text=I sat in the food car , ate and played a game on my tablet .
#text=After a while I went back to my seat , plugged my headphones into my tablet and just watched the country roll by while I listened to my music .
#text=We got to Florida on time and I had a great visit with my parents , and best of all , I did n't have to fly !
